content:
The HIMSS Innovation Center is designed to be both a showroom and an educational resource. They offer guided tours for individuals and groups, which provide an in-depth look at the center's various exhibits and demonstrations. The tours are led by expert guides who can answer questions and provide insights into the latest technologies and trends in healthcare IT.

In addition to the tours, the HIMSS Innovation Center also offers workshops and other educational programs. These are designed to help healthcare professionals stay up-to-date on the latest innovations and practices in the industry. The center can also be used as a venue for meetings and events, which can be customized to meet the specific needs of different organizations.

Overall, the HIMSS Innovation Center is a great resource for anyone interested in healthcare IT. Whether you're a healthcare professional, a technology vendor, or just someone interested in the latest trends and innovations in the industry, a visit to the center can provide valuable insights and information.
